tasks.title: Initialize planloop CLI tool project structure
context_hints: Create a new project directory and initialize a git repository.
Ensure a virtual environment is set up for Python development.

tasks.title: Set up command line parsing
context_hints: Use argparse or a similar library for parsing CLI arguments.
Start with basic commands: start, status, update.

tasks.title: Implement 'start' command
context_hints: Ensure the 'start' command initializes a new session and saves goal.
Session details should be temporarily stored in a file.

tasks.title: Implement 'status' command
context_hints: The 'status' command should fetch and display the current task or system status.
Implement basic session management to track current tasks.

tasks.title: Implement 'update' command
context_hints: Allow updating the task list and marking tasks as done.
Ensure changes are reflected in the session's state.

tasks.title: Implement file-based session management
context_hints: Develop a system for storing session data in files.
This includes current status, tasks, and whether the 'instruction_sync' has occurred.

tasks.title: Add logging for command line operations
context_hints: Implement detailed logging for debugging and tracking command usage.
Include timestamps, command names, and any errors.

tasks.title: Unit tests for CLI commands
context_hints: Write unit tests to cover all major functionalities of CLI commands.
